name: The Unidentified Flying Cat Burglars!
description:
"The Unidentified Flying Cat Burglars!" is a single player arcade game where you must invade Earth to harvest as many cats as possible to experiment on back on your home planet.

Made for the Ludum Dare 52 jam in 72 hours.

Programming, Sound Design, Music Design, Level Design - Krassenstein

Art and Art Direction - EnchantedBrews

Playable on Windows only right now.
